attributes.action: Arm all police and also put metal detectors in all schools
attributes.background: The crime rate in England has got very high especially murders and life lost by knife crime. Yets all do are bit and help the police tackle this problem!

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you want the UK Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure whether you'd like the police to be armed with Tasers, firearms or something else. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition to change the law to require all police officers to carry firearms, if that is what you'd like to happen.
